title: It Wont Let me Play on the Legacy Client
body: Everytime I try to click Legacy Client to open it up, it comes out as "LolClient patch Cernal has ran into a problem" or something along those lines... It's really weird, I've never had this issue before. I would attempt to click "Debug" and it would also stop working. Does anyone have the same Issue? Does anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body: The Kernel error you're seeing is likely caused by a setting on your PC that's blocking the client from launching.  Go over the steps of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any questions!
